languages.text: All allies in the 2-cell radius around the Cyber-Mastiff have -1 AP to their weapon Reload cost.

languages.text: Allies in a 2-cell radius around the cyber-mastiff have their {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} cost reduced by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: El coste de la {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g} para todos los aliados situados en un radio de 2 casillas en torno al cibermastín se reduce en −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: 生化獒犬周围2格内所有盟友进行{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}时，消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。

languages.text: Les alliés situés dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du cyber-mastiff bénéficient d'une réduction du coût de {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}rechargement{/g} de −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: Siber mastifin etrafındaki 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan dost birimlerin silah {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}doldurma{/g} bedelleri 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} azalır.
